attributes.action: After 3 years of claiming job seekers allowance, cap benefits and healthcare.
attributes.background: Many people scrounge off benefits without any attempt to get a job. With 16% of Britain's population being on benefits for 2 - 4 years. with 10.43bn being spent on benefits within this time period, billions could be saved. The cut will increase every year of unemployment, boosting our economy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. There is already a cap on benefits (you can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/benefit-cap) and it is not clear from your petition what you think the new cap should be.

It is also not clear what you mean by healthcare cap; for example, whether this would be a restriction on the kind of care that people can access, or a restriction on the cost of care that people can have. 

You could start a new petition which explains clearly what action you would like to see.
